resources.name: Claudable
resources.description: Claudable is an open-source web builder that leverages local CLI agents, such as Claude Code and Cursor Agent, to build and deploy products effortlessly.
resources.author: Ethan Park

resources.name: Omnara
resources.description: A command center for AI agents that syncs Claude Code sessions across terminal, web, and mobile. Allows for remote monitoring, human-in-the-loop interaction, and team collaboration.
resources.author: Ishaan Sehgal
